welcome.page.introduction.title: Thank you for choosing Cloudflare
welcome.page.introduction.message: Our global network is designed to make everything you connect to the Internet secure, private, fast, and reliable.
welcome.page.get_started.message: Get started by adding your website or application to Cloudflare, or explore our developer, zero trust, and network security products.
welcome.page.brand_value.title: A global network built for the cloud
welcome.page.brand_value.message: Connect to or build on top of the Cloudflare network for unparalleled security, performance, and reliability.
